text.__SUMMARY__: Rhinotyphlops scorteccii, commonly known as Scortecci's blind snake, is a species of snake in the Typhlopidae family. It is endemic to Africa.
text.Etymology: The specific name, scorteccii, is in honor of Italian herpetologist Giuseppe Scortecci (1898-1973).
text.Further reading: Gans C, Laurent RF, Pandit H (1965). "Notes on a herpetological collection from the Somali Republic". Annales du Musée Royal de l'Afrique Centrale, Série in Octavo, Science Zoologique, Tervuren 134: 1-93. (Typhlops scorteccii, new species, p. 56).
